participant_1.name: Harold
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and sociable, Harold enjoys sharing stories from his past adventures. He finds joy in simple pleasures and loves to connect with others.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, Mike values hands-on experiences and is always looking to learn new skills. He has a good sense of humor and cares deeply for his loved ones.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. my cats are very special to me.

content.text: do you gamble while there   or is that just part of the job
